title: 8 Essential Figma Buzz Tips Empower Designers to Craft Flexible Branded Templates for Marketing Teams

paragraphs.content: Figma's official blog details **8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz**, focusing on self-serve assets that preserve brand integrity while granting marketing teams editing flexibility.These guidelines emphasize responsive designs using **Auto Layout** to prevent misalignment from variable content like long headlines, alongside modular text layers renamed descriptively such as “Event Title” or “CTA Button Text” for Bulk Create compatibility with CSV/XLSX imports.The approach ensures templates "bend but don’t break," enabling scalable asset creation for campaigns across social media and events.

sections.title: Leveraging Auto Layout and Variants for Responsive Brand Flexibility

paragraphs.content: Figma recommends **Auto Layout as the backbone** of templates, ensuring buttons, text boxes, and images maintain spacing even with dynamic content changes, such as extended headlines that would otherwise disrupt alignment.Usability testing in Buzz involves pasting real content, swapping images, and resizing to catch issues like text overlap early.Publishing templates with clear titles, searchable names, and grouped rows standardizes organization for team browsing.
